adv:
1. Presents interesting combinations of data fields that I didn't think to create on my own.
2. The interactivity of the visualizations helped me gain significant insights quicker.
disadv:
1. A lot of the visualizations created weren't particularly helpful. Especially for those that created recommendations that didn't include any field I had selected.
2. Some of the visualizations seemed repetitive, would love to see more variation in the types of visualizations being created.
comment: Would be nice to have a loading bar while the visualizations are being created so I know that the tool isn't frozen.
